title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona. In his first hours as President of the institution, Josep Borrell has held several meetings, including a first meeting with all CIDOB’s staff.

title: Josep Borrell | CIDOB
snippet: President of CIDOB (Barcelona Centre for International Affairs). From 2019 to 2024 he served as the High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs an

title: Josep Borrell será el nuevo presidente del CIDOB | CIDOB,
snippet: El veterano político Josep Borrell se pondrá al frente del CIDOB, el 'think tank' con sede en Barcelona dedicado a la investigación en el ámbito de las relaciones internacionales, tras haber dejado hace solo unos días su cargo de Alto Representante para la Política Exterior de la UE.

title: Borrell debuts as President of the CIDOB think tank
snippet: Josep Borrell took office this Wednesday as president of CIDOB, the think tank specializing in international relations.

title: Josep Borrell
snippet: Josep Borrell is Senior Distinguished Fellow at the Elcano Royal Institute, and president of CIDOB (Barcelona Centre for International Affairs).
